p: In the present study, the ECSA genotype was identified, which corroborates other strains circulating in the northeast region of Brazil. The same genotype was detected in Ae. aegypti collected in Sergipe and represented the first report in Brazil and in the Americas [ 87], and in human samples from Alagoas, Bahia, Para√≠ba, and Sergipe [ 88, 89, 90].
